description.value: Many Tian-Dan claim to have dragon blood in their veins, and in your case, this is true-you can spit energy, and you might have an especially visible sign of your draconic heritage. Choose one of the following cantrips: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Acid Splash], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Electric Arc], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Produce Flame], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Ray of Frost]. You can cast this spell as an innate arcane spell at will, and when you cast it, the spell's energy emerges from your mouth.
